name: Magic Balls
overview: Magic Balls is a timed puzzle board game. The task requires arranging balls in a uniform red mosaic in the shortest possible time and the least amount of movements. The player may select the size of the board, rotation angle of the ball (180, 90, 45, 22,5), range of mixing balls and switch off/on the clock. The player rotates the entire row of balls vertically or horizontally. It is possible to undo the last move or pause the game.
